sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import ContentHeader from '../common/template/contentHeader' import Content from '../common/template/content' import Tabs from '../common/tab/tabs' import TabsHeader from '../common/tab/tabsHeader' import TabsContent from '../common/tab/tabsContent' import TabHeader from '../common/tab/tabHeader' import TabContent from '../common/tab/tabContent' import { init, create, update, remove } from './roomActions' import List from './roomList' import Form from './roomForm' class Room extends Component { componentWillMount() { this.props.init() } render() { return (
) } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => bindActionCreators({ init, create, update, remove }, dispatch) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(Room)
